snippet: Madrid’s new leftist City Council says it will remove all references to the dictatorship of Gen. Francisco Franco from the names of streets and plazas.
abstract: Madrid's newly seated City Council will remove all references to dictatorship of Gen Francisco Franco from names of city streets and plazas.
lead_paragraph: Madrid’s new leftist City Council says it will remove all references to the dictatorship of Gen. Francisco Franco from the names of streets and plazas.

headline.main: Spain: Madrid to Remove Reminders of Franco
headline.print_headline: Europe; Spain: Madrid to Remove Reminders of Franco
